title: Fragment, 3rd–4th century
medium:
Medium: Warp: S-spun wool. Weft: S-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: Slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 17.1 x 17.1 cm (6 3/4 x 6 3/4 in.)
description: An 'L' shaped border, possibly from a tunic. Monochrome type, purple wool and undyed linen. An interlacing geometric pattern with a three-leafed branch at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 3rd–4th century.
3rd–4th century. Medium: Warp: S-spun wool. Weft: S-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: Slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-57.
